name: BlobCat
description: The BlobCats are after the DiceMice! In BlobCat it's your job to protect the DiceMice!Solve puzzles in single-player mode or play with your friends the action packed multiplayer mode!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows XP SP2+ Memory: 1 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space Additional Notes: DOES NOT SUPPORT 32BIT SYSTEMS
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
